context_of_use: This use case allows customers to browse, search, and view detailed information about products within the e-commerce platform.
stakeholders_and_interests: customer: wants to find and evaluate products easily.
description: This use case enables customers to browse, search, and view detailed information about products to facilitate their purchasing decisions.
triggering_event: Customer initiates a product browsing session.
preconditions: Customer is logged into the e-commerce system.
postconditions: Customer has successfully browsed, searched, and viewed product details.
assumptions: The customer has an active account and is familiar with the e-commerce platform.
requirements_met: The system shall allow customers to browse products by category.
The system shall allow customers to search for products by keyword.
The system shall allow customers to view product details.
main_flow: 1. Customer browses products by category → System displays products in the selected category.
2. Customer searches for products by keyword → System displays search results matching the keyword.
3. Customer views product details → System presents detailed information about the selected product.
